sentences.english: Here, the Asia Water Project summarises the arguments.

sentences.english: The first part is the summary of correlative theories on DIS.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分是存款保險制度相關理論的概述。

sentences.english: This section will give you a brief overview of how the sorting capabilities that were put into the report work.
sentences.chinese: 本節概述投入報表工作中的排序功能的工作方式。

sentences.english: This section gives a high-level overview on the implementation of the procedures discussed so far in this article.
sentences.chinese: 本節在較高的層面上概述本文前面討論的過程的實現。

sentences.english: The current status of transparent ceramic and some of the important scintillator properties are summarized in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 概述了透明陶瓷的研究現狀及閃爍體的一些重要性能。

sentences.english: The second part overviews the general theory.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，一般理論概述部分。

sentences.english: Electroforming and its application were summarized.
sentences.chinese: 概述了電鑄工藝及其應用情況。

sentences.english: The first part gives a general introduction of key river basin control project and its management.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分是對流域控制性水工程及其管理的概述。

sentences.english: Study in Chemical Ecology of Tritrophic Interactions Among Rice, Nilaparvata Lugens and Anagrus Nilaparvatae;
sentences.chinese: 水稻，褐飛蝨，稻蝨纓小蜂的化學生態研究概述。

sentences.english: Pamela, could you give us an overview of the Administration Department?
sentences.chinese: 潘蜜拉，你可不成以給我行政打點部門的概述？

sentences.english: Sixthly, this article outlined Zhang Junmai's thought of "Mental effort".
sentences.chinese: 第六，本文概述了張君勱的“心力”說。

sentences.english: In this papert the classification and method of the digital image compression technique as well as its application to astronomy are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 概述了數字圖像壓縮技術在天文領域應用的必要性。

sentences.english: Chapter I of this article is outlined in the Anti-Money Laundering.
sentences.chinese: 本文第一章是反洗錢概述。

sentences.english: In this review the emphasis will be placed on the electrochemical reactivity of synthetic metalloporphyrin complex in nonaqueous media.
sentences.chinese: 本文概述在非水介質中合成金屬卟啉絡合物的電化學。

sentences.english: Chapter 1 begin with an introduction and overview of the computations of perturbative scattering amplitudes.
sentences.chinese: 第一章是關於微擾散射振幅計算的導論和概述。

sentences.english: We also circulated an overview paper.
sentences.chinese: 我們還分發了一份概述文件。

definition: to outline/to summarize/to sketch/summary/brief description/concise narrative/in a nutshell/briefly
(often used in book or chapter titles) general introduction/overview
to sum up/a roundup/a general narrative
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
